--- return_all_distinct.sql
GRAPH FinGraph
RETURN ALL 1 AS a, 2 AS b
NEXT
RETURN DISTINCT a AS a, b AS b

--- AST
&ast.GQLGraphQuery{
  GraphClause: &ast.GQLGraphClause{
    PropertyGraphName: &ast.Path{
      Idents: []*ast.Ident{
        &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 6,
          NameEnd: 14,
          Name:    "FinGraph",
        },
      },
    },
  },
  Query: &ast.GQLMultiLinearQueryStatement{
    Statements: []ast.GQLLinearQueryStatement{
      &ast.GQLSimpleLinearQueryStatement{
        Statements: []ast.GQLPrimitiveQueryStatement{
          &ast.GQLReturn{
            Return:        15,
            AllOrDistinct: "ALL",
            Items:         []*ast.GQLReturnItem{
              &ast.GQLReturnItem{
                Star: -1,
                Expr: &ast.IntLiteral{
                  ValuePos: 26,
                  ValueEnd: 27,
                  Base:     10,
                  Value:    "1",
                },
                Alias: &ast.AsAlias{
                  As:    28,
                  Alias: &ast.Ident{
                    NamePos: 31,
                    NameEnd: 32,
                    Name:    "a",
                  },
                },
              },
              &ast.GQLReturnItem{
                Star: -1,
                Expr: &ast.IntLiteral{
                  ValuePos: 34,
                  ValueEnd: 35,
                  Base:     10,
                  Value:    "2",
                },
                Alias: &ast.AsAlias{
                  As:    36,
                  Alias: &ast.Ident{
                    NamePos: 39,
                    NameEnd: 40,
                    Name:    "b",
                  },
                },
              },
            },
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.GQLSimpleLinearQueryStatement{
        Statements: []ast.GQLPrimitiveQueryStatement{
          &ast.GQLReturn{
            Return:        46,
            AllOrDistinct: "DISTINCT",
            Items:         []*ast.GQLReturnItem{
              &ast.GQLReturnItem{
                Star: -1,
                Expr: &ast.Ident{
                  NamePos: 62,
                  NameEnd: 63,
                  Name:    "a",
                },
                Alias: &ast.AsAlias{
                  As:    64,
                  Alias: &ast.Ident{
                    NamePos: 67,
                    NameEnd: 68,
                    Name:    "a",
                  },
                },
              },
              &ast.GQLReturnItem{
                Star: -1,
                Expr: &ast.Ident{
                  NamePos: 70,
                  NameEnd: 71,
                  Name:    "b",
                },
                Alias: &ast.AsAlias{
                  As:    72,
                  Alias: &ast.Ident{
                    NamePos: 75,
                    NameEnd: 76,
                    Name:    "b",
                  },
                },
              },
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
GRAPH FinGraph RETURN ALL 1 AS a, 2 AS b NEXT RETURN DISTINCT a AS a, b AS b
